name: Ghost Guy
description:
In this short adventure game, explore an abandoned mansion as a ghost. Collect items along the way as you obtain souls. Avoid evil ghosts trying to fight you. Do quests for a mysterious ghost.

-Collect 30 souls hidden throughout the mansion
-Find health and speed boosts
-Collect and wear 9 different hats
-Explore strange rooms of the house
-Multiple story endings to discover
